title: Facebook feels $10 Billion sting from Apple's privacy push

text: Billionaire mining magnate Andrew Forrest is taking legal action against Facebook in Australia after he claims the company failed to remove scam advertisements that used his image.

title: Meta Platforms: Not As Bad As It Looks After Q4 Results And 26% Correction
text: Meta stock fell by 26% on Thursday after Q4 results overnight. The stock is now trading at 16.9x 2021 EPS, with risks more than priced in. 2022 guidance disappointed, with Q1 revenue growth expected to be only 3-11%; TikTok and Apple iOS changes are the main factors.

title: Analysis-Facebook usage dips for first time. Will Instagram follow?
